##Matrix multiplication

Multiply A by B

$$
A =
\begin{bmatrix}
 3 & -1 \\
 5 & 2 \\
\end{bmatrix}
\times
B =
\begin{bmatrix}
 2 & -2 \\
 0 & 0 \\
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
 \dots & \dots \\
 \dots & \dots \\
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Multiply A by C

$$
A =
\begin{bmatrix}
 3 & -1 \\
 5 & 2 \\
\end{bmatrix}
\times
C =
\begin{bmatrix}
 2 & -2 & 4\\
 0 & 0 & 0 \\
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
 \dots & \dots & \dots \\
 \dots & \dots & \dots \\
\end{bmatrix}
$$


#Summation

##Sum A and B

$$
A =
\begin{bmatrix}
  1 & 2 \\
  -4 & 3 \\
\end{bmatrix}
+
B = 
\begin{bmatrix}
 2 & 3 \\
 3 & 5 \\
\end{bmatrix}
=
\begin{bmatrix}
 \dots & \dots \\
 \dots & \dots \\
\end{bmatrix}
$$
